neutral.description: Primary background of the interface which contains the main data and information.

neutral-hover.description: Hover state of the primary background of the interface which contains the main data and information.

neutral-active.description: Active (selected) state of the primary background of the interface which contains the main data and information.

info.description: Accent background of the message with regular information.

success.description: Accent background of the message or banner with information about the successful result.

critical.description: Accent background of a message or a banner with a critical information.

warning.description: Accent background of a message or a banner with a warning information.

highlight.description: Accent background of the information you want to highlight.

advertising.description: Accent background for the advertising banners and controls.

muted.description: Accented muted background for a message with regular information.

invert.description: Inverted version of the primary background of the interface that contains the main data and information.

invert-hover.description: Hover state for the inverted version of the primary background of the interface that contains the main data and information.

invert-active.description: Active (selected) state for the inverted version of the primary background of the interface that contains the main data and information.

neutral.description: Secondary background of the interface which contains the main data and information.

neutral-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background of the interface which contains the main data and information.

neutral-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background of the interface which contains the main data and information.

info.description: Secondary background of a message with regular information.

info-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background of a message with regular information.

info-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background of a message with regular information.

success.description: Secondary background of the message with success information you want to accent.

success-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background of the message with success information you want to accent.

success-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background of the message with success information you want to accent.

critical.description: Secondary background of the message with critical information you want to accent.

critical-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background of the message with critical information you want to accent.

critical-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background of the message with critical information you want to accent.

warning.description: Secondary background of the message with warning information you want to accent.

warning-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background of the message with warning information you want to accent.

warning-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background of the message with critical information you want to accent.

highlight.description: Secondary background of the information you want to highlight.

highlight-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background of the information you want to highlight.

highlight-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background of the information you want to highlight.

advertising.description: Secondary background for the advertising message you want to accent.

advertising-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background for the advertising message you want to accent.

advertising-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background for the advertising message you want to accent.

success.description: Text associated with success states and data.

success-hover-active.description: Hover and active states for the text associated with success states and data.

critical.description: Text associated with critical states and data.

critical-hover-active.description: Hover and active states for the text associated with critical states and data.

primary-invert.description: Inverted version of the primary text.

secondary-invert.description: Inverted version of the secondary text.

link-hover-active.description: Hover and active states for the link text.

link-invert.description: Inverted version of the link text. Use on dark background only.

link-invert-hover.description: Hover and active states of the inverted version of the link text. Use on dark background only.

hint-hover-active.description: Hover and active states of the hint link text.

hint-invert.description: Inverted version of the hint link text.

hint-invert-hover-active.description: Hover and active states of the inverted version of the hint link text.

large-info-hover-active.description: Hover and active states of the link text with font-size ≥20px.

large-success.description: Text with font-size ≥20px associated with success states and data.

large-success-hover-active.description: Hover and active states of the text with font-size ≥20px associated with success states and data.

large-critical.description: Text with font-size ≥20px associated with critical states and data.

large-critical-hover-active.description: Hover and active states of the text with font-size ≥20px associated with critical states and data.

info.description: Subtle secondary border in the informational message.

info-active.description: Active border in focused input filed.

success.description: Subtle secondary border in the successful message and input field.

success-active.description: Active border in the focused input field with valid state.

critical.description: Subtle secondary border in the critical message and invalid input field.

critical-active.description: Active border in the focused input field with invalid state, and active state of the other components with invalid state.

warning.description: Subtle secondary border in the warning message.

warning-active.description: Active border in components with warning intention.

primary-invert.description: Inverted version of the neutral primary border. Use it for borders on the dark or color background.

secondary-invert.description: Inverted version of the neutral secondary border. Use it for borders on the dark or color background.

tooltip-invert.description: Border of the Tooltip with dark theme.

table-accent.description: Accent borders in the Table: for the accordion in the table and for the header of the secondary table.

date-picker-range-comparison.description: Border color of the second period for the comparison mode in the DatePicker.

critical-pattern.description: Used for the invalidStatePattern utils component to mark all kinds of inputs with invalid states.

switch-bg.description: Subtle background of the Switch control.

info.description: Background of the regular primary control.

info-hover.description: Hover state of the regular primary control.

info-active.description: Active (selected) state of the regular primary control.

success.description: Background of the primary control with successful theme.

success-hover.description: Hover state of the primary control with successful theme.

success-active.description: Active (selected) state of the primary control with successful theme.

critical.description: Background of the primary control with danger theme.

critical-hover.description: Hover state of the primary control with danger theme.

critical-active.description: Active (selected) state of the primary control with danger theme.

brand.description: Background of the primary brand colored control.

brand-hover.description: Hover state of the primary brand colored control.

brand-active.description: Active state of the primary brand colored control.

advertising.description: Hover state of the advertising primary control.

advertising-hover.description: Active (selected) state of the advertising primary control.

advertising-active.description: Background of the advertising primary control.

invert.description: Inverted background of the primary control.

invert-hover.description: Hover state of the inverted primary control.

invert-active.description: Active (selected) state of the inverted primary control.

neutral.description: Background of the regular secondary control.

neutral-hover.description: Hover state of the regular secondary control.

neutral-active.description: Active (selected) state of the regular secondary control.

info.description: Background of the accent secondary control.

info-hover.description: Hover state of the accent secondary control.

info-active.description: Active (selected) state of the accent secondary control.

invert.description: Background of the inverted version of the secondary control.

invert-hover.description: Hover state of the inverted version of the secondary control.

invert-active.description: Active (selected) state of the inverted version of the secondary control.

neutral.description: Background of the regular tertiary control.

neutral-hover.description: Hover state of the regular tertiary control.

neutral-active.description: Active (selected) state of the regular tertiary control.

info.description: Background of the accent and link-lookalike tertiary control.

info-hover.description: Hover state of the accent and link-lookalike tertiary control.

info-active.description: Active (selected) state of the accent and link-lookalike tertiary control.

invert.description: Background of the inverted version of the tertiary control.

invert-hover.description: Hover state of the inverted version of the tertiary control.

invert-active.description: Active (selected) state of the inverted version of the tertiary control.

fs-50.description: Use only for text in Badge component.

fs-100.description: Use with caution for text in additional messages. Always check its contrast and readability.

fs-200.description: Use for text in regular messages.

fs-300.description: Use for H6 with bold font-weight, and for text in regular messages.

subtitle.description: Use for big subtitles on the landing pages.

scale-indent.description: Base denominator of the design system.

disabled-opacity.description: Use for the disabled state of all kind of the controls and elements.
